CaseWare Cloud Calculator

Use this tool to calculate estimate pricing based on the size of your firm (Please contact CQS for an exact quote).

User numbers should match the number of CaseWare Working Papers licences in your firm.

  • CaseWare Time Integration (requires Time Desktop)
